programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. programme.title: Miss Congeniality

programme.title: Gladiator

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-August 2024
programme.desc: Going to the cinema isn’t the cheap date it used to be, so be sure to make the most of these offers to watch a movie for less. Here are the best ways to get cheap cinema tickets this month.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Revenge
programme.desc: Some films are best served cold, so wrap up and join us as we dive into our favourite revenge movies - from new hits to Oscar-winning classics. We hope you're ready for action.

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. programme.title: Armageddon Time
programme.desc: Jewish-American 11-year-old Paul Graff attends Public School 173 in 1980 New York, where dreams of NASA and space rockets are a distraction from the teachings of ill-tempered Mr Turkeltaub. Consequently, Paul becomes a target for humiliation in class alongside African-American student Johnny Davis. The boys become friends, but prejudices repeatedly test their bond. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. programme.desc: Ayananka Bose won an award for the 'Best Cinematography' at the Zee Cine Awards 2011.

programme.title: Agent Vinod
programme.desc: (2012) The saga of love, deceit and danger as an Indian spy, Vinod (Saif Ali Khan), travels worldwide to unravel a conspiracy. Kareena plays his lady love. A film by Sriram Raghavan.

programme.title: Bol Radha Bol
programme.desc: (1992) Kishan (Rishi Kapoor) is shocked when a look-alike impostor takes his place at home. With his love Radha's (Juhi Chawla) help he must unmask those behind the conspiracy.

programme.title: Kyun - Ho Gaya Na
programme.desc: (20024) Arjun (Vivek Oberoi) doesn't believe in romance and wants to have an arranged marriage whereas, Diya (Aishwarya) is a romantic through and through. How will they ever get together?

programme.title: Ujda Chaman
programme.desc: A balding 30-year-old bachelor in search of a beautiful wife is given a deadline to find one or remain celibate forever.

programme.title: Runway 34
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Rakul Preet Singh won Best Actor - Female for this movie.

programme.title: Fukrey 3
programme.desc: After inheriting "Janta Store" Hunny, Choocha, and Lali face new challenges; Bholi Punjaban's election bid, Dhingra's corruption, and a South African adventure unfold.

programme.title: Suraj Pe Mangal Bhari
programme.desc: Suraj, an eligible bachelor, keeps getting rejected by the families of prospective brides. Soon, he uncovers that it is because of a detective named Madhu Mangal Rane.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.desc: (2017) Just out of jail, a don is ready to get back at the four friends who conned her. Starring Pulkit Samrat, Richa Chadha, Varun Sharma and Ali Fazal.

programme.title: Gadar... Ek Prem Katha
programme.desc: The film was declared an 'All-Time Blockbuster' by Box Office and won many awards including 'Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Story, Best Director, Best actor in a negative role'.

programme.title: Krrish
programme.desc: Krishna is forced by circumstances to use his superpowers and become the masked superhero Krrish, before getting drawn towards his lost legacy.

programme.title: Ghajini
programme.desc: The movie won many awards, including 'Superstar of Tomorrow - Female, Upcoming Male Vocalist of the Year, Best Action, Best Debut Actress, Best Actor, Best Action'.

programme.title: Raaz
programme.desc: (1976) (Saturday Superhits) Kumar (Rajesh Khanna) visits Viran Nagar for the first time after a series of haunting dreams, where a young Sapna (Babita) tells him that she had been awaiting his return.

programme.title: Tejas
programme.desc: Indian Air Force officer Tejas sets out on a dangerous mission to rescue an Indian spy from Pakistan. While she faces the terrorists that come her way, she must also fight the ghosts of her past.

programme.title: Baazigar
programme.desc: Shah Rukh won the 'Best Actor' award at the 39th Filmfare Awards - in 1994, the movie was also awarded for Best Music Director, Best Singer, and Best Screenplay.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Koyla
programme.desc: A woman who was tricked into marriage falls in love with her evil husband's mute servant, and is locked in a room while her husband tries to get rid of her lover.

programme.title: Maine Pyar Kiya
programme.desc: The film was praised and won many awards such as 'Best Debut Actor, Best Film, Best Music Director, Best Lyricist, Best Playback Singer - Male' at the Filmfare Awards 1990.

programme.title: Padosan
programme.desc: (1968) Musical comedy about naive Bhola (Sunil Dutt), in love with his neighbour Bindu (Saira Banu) but she is drawn to Masterji (Mehmood). Vidyapati then plans to deceive her into loving Bhola.

programme.title: Khudgarz
programme.desc: Sita raises her son, Bihari, friend Amar as her own and the 2 treat each other like brothers. However, Amar's father is not too fond of Bihari, he tries to create a rift between two.

programme.title: Shubh Mangal Savdhan
programme.desc: At the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy 2018, the film was awarded for the 'Best Actress in a Leading Role, Best Actress in a Supporting Role and Best Dialogues'.

programme.title: Madgaon Express
programme.desc: (UK TV Premiere) Childhood friends Dodo, Ayush and Pinku embark on a trip to Goa that goes completely off-track due to a sequence of terrible decisions.

programme.title: Sam Bahadur
programme.desc: Witness the exemplary story of Sam Manekshaw, who led a new India through 3 major wars until 1971 and became the 1st-ever Indian Army officer to get promoted to the rank of India's 1st field marshal.

programme.title: Raksha Bandhan
programme.desc: Lala Kedarnath is blessed with 4 sisters. But his worry is to find suitable grooms for each of them, as only then can he marry his childhood love. To what lengths will he go to succeed?

programme.title: Mercury
programme.desc: Five friends accidentally kill a man whose vision is impaired. Tension further rises when the man's ghost starts terrorising them in mysterious ways.

programme.title: Phir Teri Kahani Yaad Aayee
programme.desc: A 1993 release. An alcoholic movie director Rahul is devastated by the death of his love Pooja. Later Rahul starts getting phone calls from a girl whose voice resembles Pooja's.

programme.title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: City boy Ram falls in love with village belle Sona, who has been raised by her brother, Raghuveer. However, when his mother insults Sona, Raghuveer asks Ram to prove himself worthy of marrying Sona.

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Avinash (Bobby Deol) is arrested for the murder of his wife Sanjana (Lara Dutta). He entrusts his defence to his friend Rohit (Milind Soman). But who really killed Sanjana?

programme.title: Malamaal Weekly
programme.desc: (2006) Lilaram sells lottery tickets and one customer dies of shock upon finding out that he has won a jackpot. Now, Lilaram wants all the money, and so does everyone around him.

programme.title: Kisna - The Warrior Poet
programme.desc: (2005) (Janmashtami Spl) Kisna (Vivek Oberoi) pledges to take Catherine, his childhood friend back to England when freedom fighters vow to kill her. This is the story of their love and journey.

programme.title: Jeete Hai Shaan Se
programme.desc: (Janmashtami Spl) A 1988 release film is about three close friends. Two of them end up becoming enemies after some truths are revealed. Starring Mithun Chakraborty, Sanjay Dutt and Govinda.

programme.title: Kya Kool Hain Hum 3
programme.desc: Kanhaiya and Rocky make a living by acting in adult movies in Thailand. Things take a turn when he falls in love with Shalu, and finds it hard to convince her conservative father.

programme.title: Kaala Sona
programme.desc: Rakesh's father was killed years ago. His killer died too... or so Rakesh thought. But when he finds out that the killer is alive ahd the file closed he decides to avenge his father's murder himself.

programme.title: Dil Aashna Hai
programme.desc: (1991) Laila (Divya Bharti) is brought up by 3 women, but they are not ready to divulge who her real mother is. But Laila is determined to find out the truth about her mother.

programme.title: Players
programme.desc: A team comprising a con man, an automobile expert, a hacker, an actor and an illusionist plan a daring heist, little knowing of the betrayal that lies ahead! (2012).

programme.title: Anjaana Anjaani
programme.desc: When a suicidal Akash plans to jump off the Manhattan bridge, he meets a heartbroken Kiara there. The two decide to accomplish their unfulfilled wishes before they end their lives.

programme.title: Ankhiyon Ke Jharoke Se
programme.desc: (1978) Tearjerker in which Arun (Sachin) has to come to terms with a broken engagement with Lily (Ranjeeta), while she battles blood cancer. The soft music is the icing on the cake.

programme.title: Chintu Ka Birthday
programme.desc: This film is set during the US invasion of Iraq where amidst all the danger, an Indian family awaiting its return to India struggles to celebrate the birthday of its youngest member.

programme.title: Sniff
programme.desc: (2017) Sniff is the story of Sunny Gill (Khushmeet Gill) who cannot smell. But a freak accident gives Sunny the most refined sense of smell ever.

programme.title: WAQT: Race against time
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Shefali Shah won Best Supporting Actress in Stardust Awards, India 2006.

programme.title: Tumbbad
programme.desc: The film was praised globally and won several awards like best cinematographer, best production designer, best special effects, best film, and best feature film.

programme.title: Talaash: The Answer Lies Within
programme.desc: Inspector Shekhawat and his wife are stunned when their son dies. While his wife openly struggles to deal with her loss, he engages himself in solving mysterious death of an actor. (2012).

programme.title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
programme.desc: Jyotica Tangri won theBest Female Playback Singer in Zee Cine Awards.

programme.title: Vijaypath
programme.desc: Tabu won 'Best Debut Actor (Male/Female) award at the Filmfare Awards 1995.

programme.title: Half Girlfriend
programme.desc: (2017) Madhav meets a girl named Riya and falls in love. After struggling to convince her to be his girlfriend, she half-heartedly agrees to be his 'Half Girlfriend'.

programme.title: Barsaat - A Sublime Love Story
programme.desc: (2005) Arav, an ambitious automobile designer, travels to the US to seek better opportunities. There, he meets Anna, whose grandfather offers Arav to work with him for automobile giants, BMW.

programme.title: Milenge Milenge
programme.desc: (2010) Hoping that destiny will reunite them, a couple, on the verge of getting married, attempt to locate each other. Starring Shahid Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor.

programme.title: Yaara
programme.desc: The movie is a crime saga about two friends who once ruled the smuggling business and are now struggling to start life afresh.

programme.title: Chhoriya Chhoron Se Kam Nahi Hoti
programme.desc: (2019) (Movie @6) A young girl wishes to become an IPS officer despite the opposition from her conservative father, who thinks a woman's place is in kitchen and struggles to achieve her dream.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: An orphan joins Raw, the foreign intelligence agency of India. During a mission, all of his comrades die and he decides to seek revenge to find peace in his life.

programme.title: Heer Tey Tedhi Kheer
programme.desc: (R) Fate brings a clumsy but cheerful Heer and DJ, a rigid man, together in marriage. Can Heer overcome the challenge of being a mother-in-law to his three older daughters-in-law?

programme.title: Dilan De Rishte
programme.desc: (R) Gurman gives her son away to her friend Prabhjot and adopts her daughter, Keerat, in his place. Years later, Keerat marries Gurman's biological son. Will Prabhjot accept her as a daughter-in-law?

programme.title: Sahajveer
programme.desc: (R) Sehajveer lives a double life as a special crime branch officer and a simple teacher at an NGO. With the teachings of the Sikh gurus as her bedrock, she battles and subdues evils around her.

programme.title: Shivika
programme.desc: (R) A girl deeply rooted in spirituality and Maa Kali, a talented singer with a charming demeanor, Shivika not only identifies medicinal herbs but extends a helping hand to those in need.

programme.desc: Various spiritual leaders sing devotional songs and recite verses from the Guru Granth Sahib at a gurudwara.

programme.desc: The multi-Oscar-winning classic musical about a pompous phonetics professor who tries to transform Cockney flower girl Audrey Hepburn into a member of high society. (1964)(170 mins).

programme.title: Juventus v Man Utd 1998/99
programme.desc: We revisit the second leg of the 1998/99 UEFA Champions League semi-final between Juventus and Manchester United in Turin. The first leg finished 1-1 after a late Ryan Giggs goal.

programme.title: Leeds United v Lazio 2000/01
programme.desc: We revisit the thrilling 2000/01 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Leeds and Lazio at Elland Road. Surprise package Leeds had already guaranteed a quarter-final place.

programme.title: Manchester United v Porto 2003/04
programme.desc: We revisit the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League last 16 second leg between Man Utd and Jose Mourinho's Porto at Old Trafford. United lost the first leg 2-1, with Roy Keane seeing red.

programme.title: Liverpool v Juventus 2004/05

programme.title: Liverpool v Chelsea 2004/05
programme.desc: We revisit the dramatic 2004/05 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Liverpool and Chelsea at Anfield. The tie was finely poised after the first leg finished 0-0.

programme.desc: We revisit the 2006/07 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Liverpool and Chelsea at Anfield. Joe Cole's strike had given the Blues a 1-0 advantage in the first leg.

programme.title: Chelsea v Liverpool 2007/08
programme.desc: A look back at the semi-final second leg from the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League between Chelsea and Liverpool at Stamford Bridge. A tense first leg at Anfield had finished 1-1.

programme.title: Liverpool v Real Madrid 2008/09
programme.desc: We revisit a dramatic night at Anfield as Liverpool faced Real Madrid in the last 16 second leg of the 2008/09 UEFA Champions League. The Reds were 1-0 up from the first leg.

programme.title: Chelsea v Liverpool 2008/09
programme.desc: We revisit the 2008/09 UEFA Champions League quarter-final second leg between Chelsea and Liverpool at Stamford Bridge. Chelsea were impressive 3-1 first leg winners at Anfield.

programme.title: Inter Milan v Tottenham 2010/11

programme.title: Real Madrid v B. Munich 2011/12
programme.desc: We revisit the 2011/12 UEFA Champions League semi-final second leg between Real Madrid and Bayern Munich at the Bernabeu. Mario Gomez's goal gave Bayern a 2-1 first leg victory.

programme.title: Man City v Barcelona 2014/15
